concurr control with reader and writer the problem of themutual exclus of sever independ process from simultan access toa critic section is discuss for the case where therear two distinct class of process known as reader andwriter the reader mai share the section with each otherbut the writer must have exclus access two solut arpresent on of the case where we wish minimum delaifor the reader the other for the case where wewish write to take place as earli as possibl cacmoctob 1971 couroi p j heyman f parna d lmutual exclus critic section share access to resourc 4 304 32 ca711006 jb februari 2 1978 11 58 am1781 4 2150 1828 4 2150 1854 4 2150 18774 2150 1960 4 2150 2150 4 2150 2150 42150 2150 4 2150 2228 4 2150 2228 4 21502256 4 2150 2256 4 2150 2317 4 2150 23174 2150 2319 4 2150 2377 4 2150 2342 42150 2342 4 2150 2342 4 2150 2376 4 21502376 4 2150 2379 4 2150 2424 4 2150 24824 2150 2618 4 2150 2618 4 2150 2618 42150 2632 4 2150 2704 4 2150 2723 4 21502738 4 2150 2740 4 2150 2741 4 2150 28674 2150 3184 4 2150 3184 4 2150 1198 52150 1338 5 2150 1749 5 2150 2150 5 21502150 5 2150 2150 5 2150 2320 5 2150 25975 2150 2777 5 2150 2851 5 2150 2895 52150 2912 5 2150 2946 5 2150 3128 5 21501877 6 2150 2080 6 2150 2150 6 2150 21506 2150 2150 6 2150 2150 6 2150 2150 62150 2150 6 2150 2150 6 2150 2150 6 21502320 6 2150 2376 6 2150 2436 6 2150 25976 2150 2618 6 2150 2865 6 2150 2866 62150 2866 6 2150 2870 6 2150 2912 6 21503082 6 2150
